verses.verse: <S%H6965>Arise,<s%> <S%H215>shine;<s%> for your <S%H216>light<s%> is <S%H935>come,<s%> and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H2224>risen<s%> on you.

For, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H2822>darkness<s%> shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H6205>gross<s%> <S%H6205>darkness<s%> the <S%H3816>people:<s%> but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H2224>arise<s%> on you, and his <S%H3519>glory<s%> shall be <S%H7200>seen<s%> on you.
And the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%> shall <S%H1980>come<s%> to your <S%H216>light,<s%> and <S%H4428>kings<s%> to the <S%H5051>brightness<s%> of your <S%H2225>rising.<s%>

<S%H5375>Lift<s%> up your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about, and <S%H7200>see:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> they <S%H6908>gather<s%> themselves together, they <S%H935>come<s%> to you: your <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H7350>far,<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall be <S%H539>nursed<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> your <S%H6654>side.<s%>

<S%H227>Then<s%> you shall <S%H3372>see,<s%> <S%H7200><s%> and <S%H5102>flow<s%> together, and your <S%H3824>heart<s%> shall <S%H6342>fear,<s%> and be <S%H7337>enlarged;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H1995>abundance<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> shall be <S%H2015>converted<s%> to you, the <S%H2428>forces<s%> of the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> to you.

The <S%H8229>multitude<s%> of <S%H1581>camels<s%> shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> you, the <S%H1070>dromedaries<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> and <S%H5891>Ephah;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> they from <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> shall <S%H935>come:<s%> they shall <S%H5375>bring<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3828>incense;<s%> and they shall <S%H1319>show<s%> forth the <S%H8416>praises<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> of <S%H6938>Kedar<s%> shall be <S%H6908>gathered<s%> together to you, the <S%H352>rams<s%> of <S%H5032>Nebaioth<s%> shall <S%H8334>minister<s%> to you: they shall <S%H5927>come<s%> up with <S%H7522>acceptance<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> my <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and I will <S%H6286>glorify<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H8597>glory.<s%>
<S%H4310>Who<s%> are <S%H428>these<s%> that <S%H5774>fly<s%> as a <S%H5645>cloud,<s%> and as the <S%H3123>doves<s%> to their <S%H699>windows?<s%>

<S%H3588>Surely<s%> the <S%H339>isles<s%> shall <S%H6960>wait<s%> for me, and the <S%H591>ships<s%> of <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%> <S%H7223>first,<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> from <S%H7350>far,<s%> their <S%H3701>silver<s%> and their <S%H2091>gold<s%> with them, to the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and to the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> One of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he has <S%H6286>glorified<s%> you.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5236>strangers<s%> shall <S%H1129>build<s%> up your <S%H2346>walls,<s%> and their <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall <S%H8334>minister<s%> to you: for in my <S%H7110>wrath<s%> I <S%H5221>smote<s%> you, but in my <S%H7522>favor<s%> have I had <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on you.

Therefore your <S%H8179>gates<s%> shall be <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H8548>continually;<s%> they shall not be <S%H5462>shut<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> nor <S%H3915>night;<s%> that men may <S%H935>bring<s%> to you the <S%H2428>forces<s%> of the <S%H1471>Gentiles,<s%> and that their <S%H4428>kings<s%> may be <S%H5090>brought.<s%>
For the <S%H1471>nation<s%> and <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> that will not <S%H5647>serve<s%> you shall <S%H6>perish;<s%> yes, those <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall be utterly <S%H2717>wasted.<s%>

The <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> to you, the <S%H1265>fir<s%> tree, the <S%H8410>pine<s%> tree, and the <S%H8391>box<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> to <S%H6286>beautify<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> of my <S%H4720>sanctuary;<s%> and I will <S%H7760>make<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> of my <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H3513>glorious.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> also of them that <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> you shall <S%H1980>come<s%> <S%H7817>bending<s%> to you; and <S%H3605>all<s%> they that <S%H5006>despised<s%> you shall <S%H7812>bow<s%> themselves <S%H7812>down<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H3709>soles<s%> of your <S%H7272>feet;<s%> and they shall <S%H7121>call<s%> you; The <S%H5892>city<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> The <S%H6726>Zion<s%> of the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> One of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H8478>Whereas<s%> you has <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> and <S%H8130>hated,<s%> so that <S%H369>no<s%> man <S%H5674>went<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> you, I will <S%H7760>make<s%> you an <S%H5769>eternal<s%> <S%H1347>excellency,<s%> a <S%H4885>joy<s%> of many <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

You shall also <S%H3243>suck<s%> the <S%H2461>milk<s%> of the <S%H1471>Gentiles,<s%> and shall <S%H3243>suck<s%> the <S%H7699>breast<s%> of <S%H4428>kings:<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> am your <S%H3467>Savior<s%> and your <S%H1350>Redeemer,<s%> the <S%H46>mighty<s%> One of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

For <S%H5178>brass<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and for <S%H1270>iron<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and for <S%H6086>wood<s%> <S%H5178>brass,<s%> and for <S%H68>stones<s%> <S%H1270>iron:<s%> I will also <S%H7760>make<s%> your <S%H6486>officers<s%> <S%H7965>peace,<s%> and your <S%H5065>exactors<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

<S%H2555>Violence<s%> shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> be <S%H8085>heard<s%> in your <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H7701>wasting<s%> nor <S%H7667>destruction<s%> within your <S%H1366>borders;<s%> but you shall <S%H7121>call<s%> your <S%H2346>walls<s%> <S%H3444>Salvation,<s%> and your <S%H8179>gates<s%> <S%H8416>Praise.<s%>

The <S%H8121>sun<s%> shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> your <S%H216>light<s%> by <S%H3119>day;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> for <S%H5051>brightness<s%> shall the <S%H3394>moon<s%> give <S%H216>light<s%> to you: but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be to you an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H216>light,<s%> and your <S%H430>God<s%> your <S%H8597>glory.<s%>

Your <S%H8121>sun<s%> shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H935>go<s%> down; <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall your <S%H3391>moon<s%> <S%H622>withdraw<s%> itself: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be your <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H216>light,<s%> and the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H60>mourning<s%> shall be <S%H7999>ended.<s%>

Your <S%H5971>people<s%> also shall be <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6662>righteous:<s%> they shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> for <S%H5769>ever,<s%> the <S%H5342>branch<s%> of my <S%H4302>planting,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of my <S%H3027>hands,<s%> that I may be <S%H6286>glorified.<s%>

A <S%H6996>little<s%> one shall <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H505>thousand,<s%> and a <S%H6810>small<s%> one a <S%H6099>strong<s%> <S%H1471>nation:<s%> I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H2363>hasten<s%> it in his <S%H6256>time.<s%>
